You look great, by the way ~name~.
Oh! Kinky.
You...uh... you're going at it.
You'll run out eventually.
Pff, get my hopes up.
I really wish I could see more...
We're still on good terms, right ~name~?
Gah! I guess I saw that coming.
Is ~name~ done removing her ~clothing~?
Got cold feet or something? Come on, let loose.
Sorry about earlier...I wasn't in the right mood,
I'm suprised that came off so easily.
Where do you even find dresses in your size?
I know you are an idol, but try not to be so extra about things.
Are they tied with twigs and stuff? Maybe hemp rope?
(Angie's underskirt is showing...how intresting)
So...you went on a quest...for boots...that prance?
Knights of Blood? Isn't that an edgy name?
...are coming off.
Batman underwear, Khehehehe. What are you 10?
Seize the moment...cause tommorow I might be dead...Damn, that's some heavy shit, Buffy.
Umm...I like the colors? Sorry Buffy...
I believe I saw bins with our names on it. I think that's where we put out "important" items.
Until proven, we have to assume the floor is neither hot nor cold.
Better question, are they made for walking?
You must be extremly strong to weild such heavy gloves.
Great, now I have 8 hours to live. Thanks Corrin.
AHHH! I don't like guns. Please disarm yourself at once Elaine.
Wow, how scandalous. I think I can see your whole shoulder.
Huh, intresting.
GUUUUN! WHY DO YOU HAVE A GUN! Please get rid of it. I'll stop the puns.
Can you remove this bracelet off my arm...or this bomb in my gut...if it's possible
House elves? Are they like maids or something?
Well maybe if they would turn off the AC in this place, it wouldn't be so cold!
Oh...I have never heard that term used in that context.
If you wanna stand out just have outragous hair. Less maintenance.
This is just what I wanted.
What has pink hair and is about to freak out. Anybody with pink hair.
Luck has always been on my side. Just been too blind to see it.
With 0 BP left, I get to see your cock before I go? I don't know how I feel about this.
So, judging by the way you act...You have the condifence of somebody who is insecure about their penis size. Am I correct?
How would you not know? Wouldn't you feel it?
That was... great! Thank you all for helping discover my sexual side.
Can I go again...no one would care right?
I feel so much shame right now...
Hey ~player~, hurry and knock out this fool so they can join the bliss club.
No one say a word. It happened. Never speak of it again.
Besides the mess and weird heat coming from my body, I am pretty happy all things considering.
So...that happened...Worst part is I wanna go again.
I hope things won't be awkward between us, Pit.
Good game, I wouldn't mind doing this again! Without the mental breakdown part.

text.content: Hurry! The DEAD has to be in here somewhere!
Damnit Seven, can your fat ass move any faster?
Shut it brat! I don't want to hear it.
I-I see it! The DEAD is in here, HURRY!
OK!
OK!
*BEEP*
*BEEP*
*BEEP*
*Huff**Huff* If it weren't for ~player~ we would of been dead, Seven.
*Puff**Huff* No kiddin', thanks by the way.
So where are we anyway?
I think it's the second class cabin, according to the map.
We should start looking for a way to get out of here, wouldn't you agree?
Yeah, so here is what I think we should do.
Seven, go check the bedrooms...
Alright, but what about you and ~player~?
I will check the living rooms.
and ~player~ will check the bathroom. Let's get to it!
Alright, careful you two.
*Creek*
So this is the bathroom...kinda big isn't it?
Whatever. I can't be thinking about such minor things. Gotta look for clues.
I guess I'll start here in the shower
*10 minutes later*
Damn, I didn't find much. I wonder if Clover's and Seven's searches went any better. Better go check on them...Huh?
*Creek*
Oh! Clover! I was just gonna check up on you and Seven.
Funny. Cause I came in here to check on what was taking you so long.
So...find anything useful?
I found this lose tile, a shower curtain with a hole in it and a small key hidden in the toilet paper roll.
So besides the key, nothing useful.
Did you check up here? You have to check every nook and crany in these rooms.
Clover...you might want to be careful when standing on one foot. You might fa...
*Slip* AHHHH!
I-I GOT YOU!
*CRASH*
*It happened all so fast. All I remember is trying to catch Clover as she was falling*
*All I feel is this throbbing pain in my head and...something wet?*
*Huh?*
*She doesn't have panties on? More important things to worry about". Clover, you ok?
Yeah...HEY! What are you doing! It...it feels really good...
*I am just breathing on it...maybe if I stimulate her more...*
EEP!
AHH! Th-this feeling...it seems so familiar to me...
~player~ please...please go faster
I'm almost there...just a little bit more...I am close to the tipping point.
GHAAAAAAAA!
Damn, that was...great...I still can't shake the feeling I have experienced something like this before.
Thank you ~Player~, I didn't know you cared about me that much.
*Damn I wish I also got some action.* No problem, Clover. If you need anymore "care" just ask.
*Creek*
I heard screaming! Is everything...
Well, I guess I'll leave you two be.
*I didn't expect that.*
